none: Sleigh drivers traveling through snowy mountains at sunset; a photograph of a decorated man.  Red, yellow, green, and blue print.
Pacific Northwest Sheet Music : from the Ashford Collection

Materials in the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection are in the public domain.  No copyright permissions are needed.  Acknowledgement of the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection as a source for borrowed images is requested.

There is a dedication on the front cover: "to my friend, Capt. Wm. C. Mac Lyon, Yukon pilot and Alaskan traveler".  The back cover contains text about the composer: "Alfred Roncovieri, director of the American Concert Band of S. F."

Materials in the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection are in the public domain.  No copyright permissions are needed.  Acknowledgement of the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection as a source for borrowed images is requested.
